DOC.criteria: Female melasma lesion bilateral side Age 1865 year Dermal mix type melasma , confirm Wood 's lamp test Willing participant study sign informed consent form Pregnancy / lactation Having activity work outside build unable avoid heavy UV light Allergic UV sunscreen , topical anesthetic , topical corticosteroid hydroquinone Treatment laser chemical peel within 3 month Treatment Skin Lighting medication / food supplement within 4 week Currently use topical retinoid , hydroquinone corticosteroid within 4 week Use whiten cream alpha arbutin , azelaic acid , kojic acid ascorbic acid cosmetic within 2 week Uncontrolled medical illness include nonskin cancer , coagulopathy Intracardiac device pacemaker Photosentive condition diabetes , thyroid disease , liver kidney disease photosensitive dermatosis Currently take anticoagulant warfarin Active skin infection acute dermatitis testes skin site Unable follow comply study protocol
